title: Gavião
body: "João Gavião, as a distinguished genealogist says, was from the king's house, came to the island of Madeira, shipwrecked on Porto Santo, and settled in Caniço, where he passed away with a will in 1555." He was one of the first to use the surname Gavião on this island.

João Gavião: Pioneer in the use of the surname Gavião on the island of Madeira
